title: How to Play and Make Improvised Sipa (Kick)

steps.headline: Put a straw in a bottle cap upside-down.
Put the coin or penny over the straw in the bottle cap.
Hold the coin/penny together with the straw or get someone to do it.
Hammer the wall/barriers of the tansan/bottle cap, so, it will tighten the straw and the coin.
Each final punch of every level, you will launch it to the air then choose one special kick or punch below these steps.
steps.description: The punches before will use your palm.

steps.headline: There are infinite levels to play it: 1st level will be 5 punches with palm, 2nd level will be 10, 3rd will be 15 and so on, adding 5 each level.
Using the soles.
steps.description: Kick it like you will sit with your leg crossed. You should use your soles to kick it.

steps.headline: Using the feet (Horse kick).
steps.description: Kick like you're someone innocent, kick frontward.

steps.headline: Using Black Magic.
steps.description: This is the most difficult special kick, kick like a dancing ballerina, just bending your knees to get your leg to your back and catch the Sipa.

steps.headline: Using the sides of elbows.
steps.description: Side of the elbow is located over the elbow when you look at your elbow at the sides (the outside part).
